programme.title: Wish Boned

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Atmosphere
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Atmosphere, S03E02, How do astronauts cope with living in space?

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Quantum Leap, S01E03, Join Brian Greene on a wild ride into the weird realm of quantum physics, which governs the universe on the tiniest of scales.

programme.title: Universe or Multiverse?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?, S01E04, Cutting-edge theories are suggesting that our universe may not be the only universe. Instead, it may be just one of an infinite number of worlds that make up the multiverse.

programme.title: What Is Space?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: What Is Space?, S01E01, Brian Greene reveals space as a dynamic fabric that can stretch, twist, warp, and ripple under the influence of gravity, and explores dark energy, which makes up 70% of the universe.

programme.title: The Illusion of Time
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: The Illusion of Time, S01E02, Brian Greene takes us on the ultimate time traveling adventure, hurtling 50 years into the future before stepping into a wormhole to travel back to Big Bang.

programme.title: Flight Status
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Flight Status, S03E03, The latest updates on the new space hardware about to launch us into the next generation of space flight some rockets and capsules are on time others not so fortunate.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Gravity, S03E09, LISA pathfinder, has led the way for a space based gravity wave detector, what are gravity waves and why are they so hard to detect?

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: From There To Here
programme.desc: The New Frontier: From There To Here, S01E01, Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E03, As Billy and Ray do what they can to help save Delta and the baby, the Doctor and Goronwy the beekeeper face Gavrok and his Bannermen one last time...

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E01, Mel and the Doctor are in for a cool reception on the trading colony Iceworld, where they discover excitable teenage waitress Ace, space maverick Sabalom Glitz, and legends of dragons and treasure.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E02, The time travellers, accompanied by Glitz and Ace, search the ice caves for the treasure which is supposed to be guarded by a fearsome dragon. Little do they are leading Kane straight to it.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E03, Having sold their souls to him years ago, Kane's disaffected staff plot to kill him. Meanwhile, he plots to obtain the dragon's treasure so he can escape from Iceworld and wreak havoc once more.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E01, In Shoreditch, 1963, the Doctor’s past begins to catch up with him at the Totter’s Lane junkyard where his adventures began - and to where an old terror is returning.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E02, Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E01, As UNIT is transporting a nuclear warhead around Carbury, knights in armour arrive to continue waging a war that began thousands of years ago, but in a wholly different dimension.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E02, The Doctor and Ace explore King Arthur’s spaceship deep under Lake Vortigern, while Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart arrives in Carbury where he encounters Morgaine...

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E03, Furious at her inability to find and engage Arthur in battle, Morgaine threatens to unleash the Destroyer upon the planet unless the Doctor gives her what she wants.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E04, The Brigadier slays the Destroyer while Morgaine takes control of UNIT's nuclear warhead and prepares to start a countdown that will destroy Earth forever.

programme.title: The Dead Planet
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E01, The travellers venture out on to the surface of a new world. Everything is dead but beyond a petrified jungle, they see a huge metal city which the Doctor is determined to explore.

programme.title: The Survivors
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E02, Looking for Barbara - the Doctor, Ian, and Susan discover that they have exposed to lethal doses of radiation. The travellers are confronted by the city’s inhabitants – the Daleks!

programme.title: The Escape
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E03, Fearful of a Thal attack, the Daleks force Susan to trick the Thals. Realising that the Daleks’ are planning an ambush, the four travellers try to escape and warn the Thals.

programme.title: The Ambush
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E04, Pretending to be a Dalek, Ian finds that he is trapped inside the casing. The Doctor, Susan, and Barbara have no choice but to abandon Ian as the real Daleks arrive and attack.

programme.title: The Expedition
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E05, Ian and Barbara join a Thal expedition that will penetrate the Dalek city from the unguarded mountains behind it. Their journey is a dangerous one and not all will survive.

programme.title: The Ordeal
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E06, The Doctor and Susan are once again taken prisoner by the Daleks. In the mountains, Ian, Barbara, and the Thals must negotiate a vast chasm to reach the city.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S04E12, This episode includes: Murderer's Escape & UD, Lady and the Tramp, UD: Father/Son, Death Row Defender and Charlie's Angels & UD.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S02E05, This episode includes: Platinum Pilfer, Update: Orphan Train, Ghost Lights, Greeting Card and Caruana.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S06E05, This episode includes: Robin Hood Rabbi & UD, Missing In-Laws & UD, To Madame with Love and Deadly Dumpster

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S05E17, This episode includes: Who Killed Jeanine? (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD, UD: Charlie's Angels, Lost Generation & UD and Pigtail Fugitive.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S08E09, This episode includes: Taunting Bank Robber, Merchant Student Drowning & UD, Genius Mystery, Baby Given Away and Mia Zapata & UD.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S04E08, This episode includes: Past Lives, Murder & Extortion, UD: Smitty, 48-hour Fraud & UD and Mystery Clerk & UD.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S12E06, This episode includes: Death Row Mom, Pts. 1 & 2, Mothman and Bonnie & Clyde 2001 & UD.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S07E12, This episode includes: Padre Pio, Pts. 1 & 2, Model's Third Notebook & UD, Calculating Coroners & UD and Nazi's Lazarus.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S04E07, This episode includes: St. James' Ghost, Ghostly Attraction, Where Is She Now? and Calling Dr. Fraud & UD

programme.title: Episode: 10
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S09E10, This episode includes: Oliver, a Manpanzee, Dennis Keith Smith & UD, Blood Ties, Desperately Seeking Susan and Little Beauty Queen Death.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.

MST3K: Radar Secret Service, 19931218000000 +0000, Mike and the bots learn the art of safe driving and why you should pay attention at railroad crossings in the 1959 short, Last Clear Chance. Later, they watch government agents use radar technology to catch criminals in Radar Secret Service.
MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come, 20220930000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).
MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru, 20220902000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.
MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men, 19971011000000 +0000, Our heroes discover just how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Crew
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E09, In part two of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the team discuss the Satellite of Love crew.
Laserblast, 19960517000000 +0000, A teenager discovers a laser weapon left behind by turtle-like aliens. He uses it for petty revenge, but the weapon slowly changes his personality.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

MST3K: Master Ninja I, 19920111000000 +0000, The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.

Kitten Bowl, 20140202000000 +0000, The greatest feline showdown in cable television history! The competition will consist of two preliminary playoffs and a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern and John Sterling.
Kitten Bowl II, 20150201000000 +0000, A feline competition featuring two preliminary rounds followed by a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Kitten Bowl III, 20160207000000 +0000, Hallmark Channel presents the nation's most athletic, adorable and adoptable kittens in a claws-out, paws-out showdown for Kitten Bowl III. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

programme.title: A Birthday Wish
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E05, Hallmark Original Series. When a visiting chef is unable to relax, Cassie arranges for a day at the stove.

programme.title: Say It with Candy
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E06, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail, jealous of Cassie's attention, decides to sell "special" chocolates.

programme.title: In Sickness and in Health
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E07, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie gives a withdrawn traveling artist a new paintbrush.

programme.title: Somewhat Surprising
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie decides to plan a surprise party for Sam.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E19, Sheppard and the team visits the planet Taranis at the invitation of two leading citizens, Dr. Norina Pero and Chancellor Lycus, who want McKay to repair a failing shield generator at an Ancient base, and Ancient warship, they've discovered.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E01, After their alliance with the Wraith backfires, the team must find a way to stop two Hive ships that are headed for Earth. Weir orders to attack and Sheppard is forced to rely on Michael to help him save McKay and Ronon, who are being held prisoners.

programme.title: Misbegotten
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E02, Successfully using the retrovirus to turn an entire hive ship of Wraith into humans the team returns to Atlantis with their prisoners in stasis. Weir continues to defend her leadership in the face of an independent review being conducted by the IOA.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E03, The team comes across a small village with a revered leader. Beckett soon becomes so enamored by his host he brings him to Atlantis. But soon, McKay discovers that Lucius is using some sort of pheromone to enchant those around him.

programme.title: Sateda
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E04, Exploring a village, the team is suddenly attacked and taken prisoner as Ronon had unknowingly lured the Wraith there. The villagers set Sheppard and Teyla free, who mobilize a strike force. When they return, the village has been devastated.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E15, Colonel Maybourne visits O'Neill and claims to have a key to a cache of alien technology, but demands a presidential pardon in exchange for it. When SG-1 accompanies Maybourne to retrieve it, they find his intentions may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E16, SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E17, General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E026, Brandon and Steve have car trouble and the girls organize a fundraiser involving a pin-up calendar.

programme.title: Divas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E027, Brenda auditions for the leading role in the school play and Brandon receives some unwanted attention.

programme.title: Acting Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E028, Kelly and Brenda fight over the lead role in the school play. Andrea is rushed to the hospital.

programme.title: Truth Or Consequences
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E029, Vicious rumors spread when Brenda gets the lead role in the school play. Steve and Brenda prevent a suicide.

programme.title: Vital Signs
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E030, Brandon fears he will lose his chance to go to Washington. Kelly and Dylan break up. Andrea goes into labor.

programme.title: Mr. Walsh Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E031, Brandon goes to Washington D.C. and Kelly decides to surprise him by showing up later. Donna worries about David spending time with another girl.

programme.title: Under the Influence
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E002, Brandon and Kelly continue to hide their relationship from Dylan, but the truth is always bound to come out somehow.

programme.title: A Clean Slate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E003, Brandon's decision to run for student government proves to be fatal for one California University sophomore.

programme.title: Life After Death
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E004, Brandon wins the election, but Josh's death hangs heavy on him. Alex tells Brandon he's contesting the election, using Josh's death as leverage to unseat Brandon.

programme.title: Rave On
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E005, Where there's smoke, there's fire, in Kelly's opinion... at least where Valerie is concerned.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E006, The President of Selanesia visits California University to receive cancer treatment.

programme.title: Who's Zoomin' Who?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E007, When the fire marshal shuts down the After Dark for violating capacity, Steve suggests purchasing the space next door.

programme.title: Things That Go Bang In The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E008, Dylan's desperation becomes obvious to all when he takes out his gun and shoots up his living room.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E19, When severe cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy, Matt and Summer volunteer to guard as civilians. But can they convince the county commissioners to increase the budget before lifeguards are laid off?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E20, Stephanie Holden spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E21, Matt doesn't know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her frantic father. Meanwhile, Stephanie must choose between Mitch and Scott.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E22, A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a rescue on the Baywatch beach and realizes that a television series based on lifeguarding is perfect, sending Baywatch headquarters into a tizzy.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E02, Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake! Hobie's and Jackie's lives hang in the balance. It is up to the Baywatch team to save them before it's too late!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E03, After a recent earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother in Ohio. When they both show up at headquarters a few weeks later Mitch is surprised, especially when he hears the reason they are there.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E04, John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in the Baja Run dune buggy race with him. What Mitch doesn’t know is Cort is keeping a secret which could land them both in a Mexican prison.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E05, Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and entrusts Hobie with the responsibility of taking care of himself during that time. But Hobie becomes infatuated with an older girl and is pressured into throwing a party without Mitch’s knowledge.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E06, Carter McKay has recently moved to Southern California to live with his father after his mother's death. When Hobie invites him to the annual father/son lifeguard competition Hobie learns the reason Carter is so embarrassed by his father.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over Your
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E07, When a woman Mitch refers to as “The Mermaid” turns out to be the wife of a crime boss, an FBI agent comes to catch him before he can escape the country. Things become complicated when Mitch and the catty FBI Agent butt heads.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E08, The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.
